name: OSU
author: Spyro The Bat
description: Fetch OSU! profile data for a user by username for the game OSU!. Using API https://osu.ppy.sh/api/v2/.
short: Fetch OSU! profile data for a user by username for the game OSU!.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no user data. This cog use API available at https://osu.ppy.sh/api/v2/.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing my cog OSU.
Typing `[p]set api osu client_id,<client_id> client_secret,<client_secret>` before typing command `[p]osu <username>` for retrieving information for username.
Information retrieving:
- Username
- Last played map
- Creator of the map
- Number of played of the map
- Rank of the map
- Score of the map
- Max combo of the map
- Performance Points (PP) of the map
- Performance Points (PP)
- Global rank
- Country rank
- Accuracy
- Total plays
- Level
